Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kostner
ShortDescription: Westbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier rasied bridge over the Chicago River at Clinton. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Green and Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.   

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
